snippet: French President Francois Hollande arrives in Washington. Also on the Minute, a possible nuclear waste solution beneath the New Mexico desert and the physics of ski jumping.
abstract: French President Francois Hollande arrives in Washington. Also on the Minute, a possible nuclear waste solution beneath the New Mexico desert and the physics of ski jumping.

headline.main: Times Minute | A Stag State Visit
headline.kicker: The New York Times News Minute
